document_data.caption: Packaged elven bread.
document_data.name: Elven Bread
document_data.mainbody: '''Elven bread''', or '''elf-bread''', was a highly nutritional [[bread]] produced in [[Evermeet]]. It was available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.
document_data.Description: Elven bread was a rolled pastry loaf. It was fine-grained, light, and sweet
document_data.Reputation:
Eating too much elven bread was thought to make people fat.

It was also rumored that an Elven bread-based diet played a role in [[Elminster Aumar|Elminster]]'s longevity.
